about_the_game:
Old Magic Grandtower is a 2 player coop puzzle adventure game, combining tactical floor-breaking combat against fairy-tale creatures with challenging puzzles on every floor. 

Floor-breaking combat

Fight on a crumbling tower floor where every skill matters - break, push, pull, and outmaneuver your enemies to send them plunging into the void below.

Navigate intricate puzzles

Solve challenging puzzles that require clever teamwork - combine both heroes' unique abilities to overcome obstacles and ascend the Tower.

The Stained Spire

Your main goal is to reach the top of the Old Tower, uncovering the dark secrets within and discovering the origins of the Ink Apocalypse that shattered the fairy-tale world 30 years ago.

Unlikely Allies

Take control of Red Riding Hood and the Big Bad Wolf, both forever changed by the years following the Ink Apocalypse. Red, a war-hardened veteran struggling with PTSD, joins forces with the Wolf, who's grown weary of his villainous reputation and seeks to forge his own path through humanity.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950, 2 GB or AMD Radeon R9 380, 4 GB
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
